text: "Kansas City" is a 1952 R&B; song by Little Willie Littlefield and was first recorded as K. C. Loving, the song later became a hit in 1959 as a blues track by Wilbert Harrison. It is one of the best songs by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller. title: Kansas City (Leiber and Stoller song)
